title: Herbal Eye Cream (Cucumber + Triphala)
excerpt: A cooling, hydrating eye cream with cucumber extract and triphala to soothe puffiness and nourish delicate skin.
content:
## What Is This Herbal Eye Cream?
A nourishing eye-area formula using cucumber extract for cooling, triphala infusion for antioxidant support, and almond oil + shea butter for hydration.

## Ayurvedic Significance
Cucumber cools Pitta around the eyes; triphala is traditionally used to support ocular health and skin vitality.

### Key Benefits
- Reduces puffiness and soothes tired eyes.
- Supports brighter, hydrated under-eye skin.
- Antioxidant-rich and cooling.

## Ingredients
- Cucumber extract
- Triphala infusion
- Almond oil
- Shea butter

## Usage Instructions
- Dab lightly around the orbital area nightly.
- Avoid direct eye contact.

## Packaging
- Small jar with hygienic spatula.

## Safety & Consultation
- Patch-test first. Consult dermatologist if you have eczema or dermatitis around the eyes.

## Why Choose This Cream?
A cooling blend tailored for digital-age fatigue and under-eye dullness.
